name: King's Run
description:
Made for GMTK2022 - unfortunately a physics bug to do with the core experience of the game (this bug didn't show up in the editor, only later on when making a windows/web build) meant we have not been able to fully achieve our vision for this game.

Uploaded is a version without a main feature that can still be enjoyed, just not to the spec of what we envisioned it, so some of the dialogue will not make sense with the outcomes of the dice games.

We've uploaded a video of the gameplay with this core feature enabled, played in the unity editor where the bug is not present:
